website_summaries.verdict: User-friendly design that is well-liked by experienced baristas.
pros: Heats 1 cup of milk at a time
Convenient cord design wraps around base for easy storage
Non-stick interior coating makes for easy, effortless cleaning
Durable stainless steel body and Tritan plastic lid
cons: Some users cited the off/on switch could be a bit more user-friendly and communicative

customer_reviews.title: Almond milk frothing flop
customer_reviews.text: I received this device several weeks ago. Initially, it did great frothing the almond milk I always use. But after a while, it stopped frothing the almond milk and the result was an unappetizing foamy mess. I messaged the company about this, but all I got from them was a write up about the properties of almond milk vs. regular milk. They claimed that almond milk would not froth successfully, which is incorrect. I sent them pictures of the earlier froth results from the almond milk and then the current results. They are not apparently interested in sending a new machine. I'm really disappointed in their lack of customer service and their lack of interest in making this right.
customer_reviews.author: Urban Texan

customer_reviews.title: Real latte
customer_reviews.text: We heard from a friend and decided to get one, great product! Very European style coffee throughout the day. Amazing how it foam the milk and enriches the coffee both on flavor and look. Very easy to wash an clean. Good quality product at a fair price.
customer_reviews.author: Dino Del Toro

customer_reviews.title: Worked great until it didn't!!!
customer_reviews.text: I used this device less than two months. It worked great until this morning. Then it just decided to stop working. It started up but wasn't operating normally. It twirled the milk very weakly. So I stopped it, emptied the contents and started over again (I did use cold milk, so that wasn't the problem). But alas, it had died it wouldn't work at all. It will be returned. A shame, I think Bodum is usually a good brand name.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Almost like Being in a Parisian Cafe
customer_reviews.text: Loved having warmed frothed milk to add to our coffee. It works better with milk Rather then half and half because their is more froth and easier clean up. My son and husband love that it keeps the coffee warmer longer because you aren’t adding cold cream to the hot coffee. I wish it was a bit easier to clean and you MUST clean after each us.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: Update: now stopped working....  more for design than anything else
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: it stopped working after less than a year..... Old review: It does the job. the milk is not super warm by the end. but I bought it more for its design and its price compared to other milk frothers. it is pretty compact. and when you clean it you have to clean the whole thing, nothing detaches. the good thing is, its very easy to use. no bells and whistles. but cleaning can be annoying and its not the best frother out there. still looks good in my kitchen though and takes very little space.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Froths beautifully, even almond milk!
customer_reviews.text: I fell in love with my friend's Nespresso frother but didn't want to play $99, so I tried this one. Just as easy to use, foam is the same consistency. Great bang for the buck!
customer_reviews.author: Aficionado

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for about 2 month now, and really wish I'd kept the box and returned it before my time ran out. It heats up and froths the minimum amount of milk just fine, but if you add any more milk it will overflow....every time. You also have to wait to use it again, or run cold water into it until it cools sufficiently to allow it turn back on. Big waste of time, and wish I hadn't wasted my money. Currently looking for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: cindersbaby72

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately it stopped working after 6 months. First the frother stopped and I only had hot milk, now it wont even turn on. It's a bummer because I really liked it.
customer_reviews.author: Jrosenow

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last more than 6 weeks
customer_reviews.text: This little machine was terrific, until it wasn't. This Bodum Bistro Electric Milk Frother completely stopped working after a mere 6 weeks, using it only twice daily. Amazon stated the cutoff date for return of this item was July 30. The Bodum frother stopped working two weeks after this date. The item was ordered June 27 and was delivered on June 29. While the Bodum Electric Milk Frother was a great milk frother (even with hard to read inner fill lines), I would never recommend buying one and I certainly won't replace this with another of the same. In fact, I won't order another milk frother through Amazon, as amazonian as it may be.
customer_reviews.author: Geneva

customer_reviews.title: It worked well until it died in 40 days and the company won't respond.
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this frother. It worked perfectly for about 40 days, then it just died. Since the return window was 30 days, we contacted Bodum and requested a replacement based on their 1 year warranty. Bodum replied with a case number and some further information requests. Those were provided on April 13th. We have not heard from them since that date (it's now June 16). I sent 3 follow up emails to no avail. UPDATE: June 16, 2020. Bodum finally replied and is giving us a credit on their website to purchase another frother, which is out of stock until July. The delay was probably due to the Covid-10 crisis.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Like it, Loved it, the. It died
customer_reviews.text: I had no idea what to rate this. I was really pleased with it at first. The price was right. the first two times I used it, it ended up with perfect frothy milk. The third time I tried to used it... nothing. It crapped out completely. I had it stored in a safe place, followed all the care instructions. A little disappointed that I have to return it now, but if it kept wprking as well as it started it would be a definite 5 star review.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Best milk frother I’ve used at home
customer_reviews.text: I have had a few electric milk frothers come through our house (wands, stove top, others identical to this [I.e. Starbucks]). I can honestly say this has been the best one. Most milk frothers are not strong enough to foam non-fat milks (see: skim, almond, vegan, etc). It was a pleasant surprise when this one whipped our unflavored, original almond milk like it was whole. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Eunic Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Wish it kept working
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this item when we first got it. It frothed very well and warmed the milk perfectly... too bad it only worked 6 times before dying. To make it even worse the manufacturer has pitiful communication, so trying to get help from them after it died was just frustrating. Returned the item and will just look for something of better quality, hopefully made by a company that will better stand behind their product!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use but the froth is too stiff
customer_reviews.text: This has two modes of operation, one is heat and the other is heat and froth. I primarily for it to heat and froth. In this mode it really makes super hard foam because it starts frothing while the milk is still cold and doesn't stop till it is warm. Cannot make a decent pour with this. In heat mode, the milk is not moving and it always burns the milk a little. We have been using it in froth mode and only keeping it on for 10 seconds. The milk is a little cool, but at least the froth is still useful.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Clayton A. Matthews

customer_reviews.title: *Dead after 4 months* Warm,  frothy milk
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I'm so sad. After 4 months my steamer died :( Very happy with product. Milk is just the right temp for hot chocolate, coffee, lattes, etc. Makes a strong foam. Cons: no pour spout so milk dribbles down the side. Milk fats collect at bottom so needs a little scrubbing after use.
customer_reviews.author: Gen Apple

customer_reviews.title: Clean asap after pouring in espresso. froth stands straight up B+
customer_reviews.text: If you have big hands it hard to get the mixing spring out to clean its held in place by magnets sealed under the cup. Directions say you can not submerge cup under water nor get outside components wet so this makes it challenging to clean. when heated and frothing comes to a complete stop pou milk quickly then rinse or residue will collect and is very difficult to remove. a sponge with a small non abrasive e scrubby works but remember you can't get bottom of cup wet. hmmm froth is so thick and delicious stands up in cup. Love it !! Photo of foam is almond breeze coconut milk.
customer_reviews.author: D.M.

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to replace my Nespresso milk frother that worked for years but finally broke. It was great at first but after 8 months it won’t turn on. I didn’t want to splurge on a Nespresso frother because of the price, but now realize I should have. This was a waste of money. I’m now going buy the Nespresso one after wasting my money on this. Do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy

customer_reviews.title: NO MORE GOING OUT FOR COFFEE!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best milk frother! Ever since I received this, it saves me from going out to get coffee everyday! I use the original unsweetened soy milk and I can't believe how it foams so well. Its easy to use and to clean. The product is good quality and well made for the price! This would be a nice gift for someone who is a coffee drinker, I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: love-to-ski

customer_reviews.title: Don't lose the impellers
customer_reviews.text: I lost the impellers for mine and contacted Bodum for replacements. Here is the response I got: "Thank you for contacting BODUM. We are sorry to hear about the problems you have been having and thank you for bringing it to our attention. Unfortunately the item doesn't have spare parts. Apologies for the inconvenience. Kind regards." Very poor customer service IMO. Although it works fine with the included impellers, lose them and you have a useless useless device.
customer_reviews.author: Gary S.

customer_reviews.title: My disappointment is immeasurable and my day is ruined.
customer_reviews.text: If you find yourself dreaming of your morning coffee with a beautiful coating of froth, do not buy this product. I’ve tried using this product with soy milk, oat milk, rice milk, almond milk, creamer, and regular milk. I’ve followed all of their directions and what did I get? Absolutely no froth. The product will heat your milk quickly, sure, but will it meet your actual purpose for buying it? To froth your milk? No. It won’t. Not one bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jill Davis

customer_reviews.title: Could be (much) better, but it works and is cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Had several other chinese branded frothers that I actually liked better than this one, but they broke or failed quickly (within weeks). This one seems to be doing OK, but it’s loud, the whisk like to slip off the magnetic peg that holds it on, milk burns on the cheap non-stick coating, the switch is new old stock from Radio Shack, and it’s all swatched in the cheapest looking black plastic you’ve ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pang

customer_reviews.title: Good value...but small for lattes
customer_reviews.text: Love how fast this heats and froths milk. It does burn/scald the milk as you empty the container—you can hear it as you decant the milk into your cup so there is some extra cleaning as opposed to just rinsing. Wish it was larger. For large lattes I have to fill it a second time. Great value for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: PNW buyer

customer_reviews.title: Can't pour the milk out!
customer_reviews.text: This brother does a beautiful job. It even keeps warming/frothing your milk when you forget about it, which is also nice. The major issue though is that when you try to pour the milk out... it just creates a big mess! There is no pouring lip on the frother, seems like a major oversight by the Bodum designers which is surprising given the quality of Bodum products.
customer_reviews.author: WP

customer_reviews.title: Great but small
customer_reviews.text: Its hard not to give 5 stars because I use this product every day (and actually ordered another to keep at girlfriends apartment) but it has one flaw. It's just not big enough. Unless you make a latte in the tiny cups grandma would serve tea in then you will not get a full cup. Still love it, but wish it was bigger.
customer_reviews.author: TaffToff

customer_reviews.title: Worked great when it worked!
customer_reviews.text: Stopped working after 2 months. I was asked to send video to shown what was happening, no froth, just foam. Well of course Bodum customer service said foam, and froth are from using different types of milk. I use heavy whipping cream and no other type of milk. bad reviews about this product working for a few months, my complaint is not new to Bodum. Still under warranty And customer service says it’s the milk!!
customer_reviews.author: Mia

customer_reviews.title: Works well, kinda a pain to clean
customer_reviews.text: A great frother at a great price. It works well and comes from a known brand in coffee (there are a lot of cheap frothers from no name companies out there). It is easy to operate and you get frothy milk at the perfect temp. My only complaint is that it is kinda a pain to clean. You have to wipe it out and you aren't supposed to put it under running water. However, this is just a downside of this style of frother. For the price you won't find a better frother.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: This is OK
customer_reviews.text: This unit does do the trick for frothing milk, half and half and even heavy cream. However, when you pour it into the cup it drips down the side of the vessel so a pour spout would be nice. It also is a little hard to clean since each time I use it the dairy product "browns" to the bottom of the inside and has to be scrubbed out or it gets more and more brown/burned. Otherwise, so far it's working fine!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Page-Fockler

customer_reviews.title: Thes Device Rocks!
customer_reviews.text: My first use failed miserably. It was REALLY loud, heated the milk but did not froth. I thought I had a defective unit. I tried it today...perfect hot foam!!!! In the early ‘90’s I had an espresso machine and the foam I created with it was MUCH worse than this one. As for value it’s $11 more than almost every competitor’s foamer.
customer_reviews.author: Typical Geek

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after only  few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Now I have an expensive milk warmer instead of a frother. Have been getting nowhere with support even though it is under warranty. The one reply I've received asked for a video of the problem. I'm not quite sure how much clearer I can be in describing the issue and feel like I'm just getting the "run-around". I have to admit, this experience is souring me from purchasing any Bodum products in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working
customer_reviews.text: Frother was good while it was working. Unfortunately it lasted just over 1 year in moderate use (one cup per day). Contacting the company received zero response after 5 weeks (although they acknowledged that there is a case #). Buying a replacement and it definitely will not be a Bodum
customer_reviews.author: Simon S

customer_reviews.title: Burned milk at bottom
customer_reviews.text: Bern using this for about two weeks now, burned milk at the bottom every time I used it, tried both minimal and maximum amount of milk, I had to manually turn it off while the milk is around room temperature to avoid cleaning with a brush for a few minutes, maybe it's the milk I'm using? I only drink Whole milk.
customer_reviews.author: Rae G.

customer_reviews.title: Transformed my morning coffee
customer_reviews.text: Want a latte? Cool, no problem. Don't want your coffee to cool down because of added cream, done! Love this little gadget. I add a little syrup for a Starbucks experience and whisk away. Lesson learned - Do NOT let the base get wet. It will stop working.
customer_reviews.author: S. Boyme

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Will buy again when the time comes!
customer_reviews.text: Second time purchasing this product! I first got this at target, but my husband put it in the dishwasher (hand wash only!). So I had to get a new one... great product, I love this! Looks great and does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Burns!
customer_reviews.text: So this foams milk great (so far) but it burns the milk touching the metal on the bottom and requires cleaning after EVERY use. If not, the burned milk film sticks on the bottom and is almost impossible to get off. I have to use a scrub brush after every use which is a total pain.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 5 months
customer_reviews.text: was good until it died. :( motor stopped turning. I am careful with my stuff.
customer_reviews.author: BrianByTheOcean

customer_reviews.title: The Frother worked well once, then performance dropped dramatically, died completely after 12 months
customer_reviews.text: My brother has one of these, that works very well. Three friends and I each bought one of these and NONE of these work as well, except the first day. We have tried everything to no avail. We recommend buying a different Milk Frother
customer_reviews.author: P Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Great little frother
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little frother, froths milk well, easy to operate and clean, and fits nicely out of the way on counter by coffee pot. It's only negative is that since it doesn't have a spout, it makes a mess every time you pour from it. Milk drips down the sides and onto the counter. Still like it, just have to wrap a paper towel around it when I pour.
customer_reviews.author: REGENNA M. BABIN

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: For the price this works well. I don’t like that you need to remember to switch it off. It shuts off when it completes but you have to flip the rocker switch before you use it again or it starts frothing. My old one had a handle and I think did a better job with quantity of froth. Overall I’m pretty satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Lt4921

customer_reviews.title: Good overall frother
customer_reviews.text: Great little frother! My only complaint is that it could use a pouring spout of some kind. I pour it into a separate container and then pour into my coffee.
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: Works great! 👍
customer_reviews.text: This little device is very impressive. Brings milk, cream or any nut variety to a gentle froth and gradual warmth . It works perfectly and cleans very easy when you use cold water to spray out contents from it. One small issue if overfilled is it will come out of the top so better to underfill .
customer_reviews.author: AJW

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Milk Frother
customer_reviews.text: Works well enough. It works as advertised and is pretty easy to clean- just don't use any abrasive cleaners and you should be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Batman_Bin_SuparmanTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Twice, broken on arrival
customer_reviews.text: I love the product don’t get me wrong. The first one failed on me after 15 days. Got 2 replacements from Amazon and both didn’t work upon arrival. I’ll have to go back to my manual frother....... I can’t be bothered to send a ticket in again....
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Mak

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap for a reason, only lasted me 1.5 months!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product. I loved how it frothed the milk (oat and almost) BUT it literally died a month and a half of owning it. The magnetic frother part is no longer spinning and I can only use it to warm milk not froth. Which is the main reason I bought it. I think they use cheap materials and at the end of the day, that's probably why it's so inexpensive. Verdict? Spend a little more on another one that will last you longer! Lesson learned here.
customer_reviews.author: Eduardo Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Elevates our morning cup
customer_reviews.text: Love what this does to half-and-half. Really elevates our morning coffee. Very easy to clean as the froth or in the middle is attached by a magnet so it just pops out. Love it
customer_reviews.author: G. McKenzie

customer_reviews.title: First time used bottom burnt already
customer_reviews.text: Received it yesterday. I was so exited to use it this morning for my coffee. First of all, it doesnt foam the milk, it only a little bit heating, after i poured the milk out, i saw the bottom of this frother burnt. very disappointed, and i saw its Made in China product. I want my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Ting

customer_reviews.title: Great milk frother!
customer_reviews.text: This has been the perfect addition to my morning coffee or tea. The frother works great with almond creamer as well as dairy creamer. Love that it heats up the creamer too. The only thing I wish this unit had is a poor spot for poring out frothed cream and for washing.
customer_reviews.author: jessd83

customer_reviews.title: No auto shut off and loud buzzing
customer_reviews.text: Quite disappointed Makes a noise when you run it and doesn’t automatically shut off. It does froth and warm the milk.
customer_reviews.author: Saffi

customer_reviews.title: Great for warming and frothing milk
customer_reviews.text: This is great for warming and frothing milk for our favorite lattes. It is quiet and fast! I love this device! It is easy to clean and use!
customer_reviews.author: Notaplainjane

customer_reviews.title: Good Enough
customer_reviews.text: So far it functions very well. I gave 4 stars only because it works on 110V only. Update: The machine stopped frothing in less than 2 months of use (not on daily basis). The frothing part is not moving anymore and only heating the milk. Also, it cant be used for next cup without getting it cleaned as milk gets burned and spoil that taste of the coffee.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Esmail

customer_reviews.title: WORKS and is easy
customer_reviews.text: This frother is perfect. It is so easy to use and clean and does best with higher fat content creamers and milk but CAN create some with lowfat milk too. Recommend. Easy cleaning too.
customer_reviews.author: Momofmany

customer_reviews.title: Love the product, broken base
customer_reviews.text: Would have given it a 5 but base came broken. It frothed the milk really well and was not hard to clean. I suggest cleaning it right after use so the milk doesn't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Nikita

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Frother!
customer_reviews.text: I am over the moon satisfied with this Bodum Electric milk frother. It does best with higher fat content milk, but it even works on chocolate milk. The kids loved their hot chocolate with froth.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Efstathiou

customer_reviews.title: Works but could use improvement
customer_reviews.text: The product does the job. I have had trouble with my milk cooling off before I go to use it and the frother will not cycle again for quite some time (and I end up waiting and extended period of time to heat the milk again). Also it is quite difficult to keep it clean to my standards.
customer_reviews.author: Shanbanan

customer_reviews.title: Finally one that works!
customer_reviews.text: This is my THIRD time trying a frother of different brands. I should have known to buy Bodum from the beginning, this is the only one that works properly and is clearly sturdy enough to last. I use it every morning. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: VancouverBernie

customer_reviews.title: Very good gift for a coffee lover!
customer_reviews.text: This item is very easy to clean and very efficient in turning a small amount of cream into a large amount of froth! Be sure to read the directions as the frother once turned on, will turn off once the froth has reached 70 degrees and them will automatically be turned off. Then it will turn back on if the temperature drops below a certain point. You will need to manually turn off the frother to avoid it turning back on when not needed. My mom and college roommate both have one and both love it immensely!
customer_reviews.author: Carson Swoboda

customer_reviews.title: Does not work with non-dairy
customer_reviews.text: I have a similar machine at work which coworkers have success with so I bought this to use at home. I have tried it with almond milk, almond coffee creamer, oat milk, coconut milk, and soy milk- and nothing works to get any foam or bubbles. It heats up the milk but the frother/wisk on the inside just does not seem to work with any non-dairy milks or creamers. You simply end up with warm milk that has been stirred a bit.
customer_reviews.author: ALi

customer_reviews.title: Is Good for 30days then you need a new one
customer_reviews.text: I bought it lesa than 2 months ago, and today it stopped working. It warmed the milk a little but didnt make the foamy like it supposed to. Now I wasted my money I cant return because the return window passed
customer_reviews.author: Maritzavette

customer_reviews.title: This makes frothing SO SO much easier.
customer_reviews.text: This makes frothing SO SO much easier. Its easy to use, has a ton of power, and overall makes my morning routine simpler. I just wish it were a bit easier to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: Non-returnable after short time
customer_reviews.text: Item broke 31 days after purchase, won't even turn on - and you can't return it! "Out of return window" on Amazon. Bought May 15, return window closed June 13. Poorly designed product too - holds hardly any milk, does not heat it to anywhere near hot enough, and when you pour new milk in to heat (because it did not heat enough of it in the first place) often the temperature switch does not even trigger so it just sits there still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Yoerg

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this machine!!!!! It takes my morning lattes to the next level. It’s super easy to use and clean. It only takes 1 minute to steam / froth the milk! This is seriously the machine of my dreams.
customer_reviews.author: ryan

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: It stopped frothing after a few weeks. I don't know if it just needs a metal replacement piece but it did not last long at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mackenzie B

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Product stopped working entirely after a month of use! Super bummed about this one cause the return window is a month after delivery and it broke about a week after that. Don’t buy this product, made super cheap and not waterproof or washable In any way
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Bengston

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this little machine!! I have used both half & half and SO coconut creamer.........the best thing since sliced bread. We also have one of these at work and I'm surprised we have not worn it out yet. This machine is AWESOME! Note to other users: Be certain the contacts are touching or the unit will not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy
customer_reviews.text: I drink my coffee with heavy cream, and this frother hearts and froths the cream nicely. Easy peasy!
customer_reviews.author: GsGood

customer_reviews.title: Great Frother!
customer_reviews.text: A really nice frother - but I wish it had a little spout to pour and it's almost too wide to wrap my hands around. But as far as working as a frother that heats the milk for my coffee it's perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Emma the Cat

customer_reviews.title: Make's the best frothed milk
customer_reviews.text: for a latte. I use an espresso style coffee and then the frothed milk. Each cup costs less than a dollar including the specialized coffee I buy (Cafe Bustelo by Keurig) . I'm saving $3.17 on the equivalent Starbucks Grande Latte. For me, that's about $90 a month.
customer_reviews.author: James France

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: I use this every day! Very easy to use and easy to clean. Will definitely buy this product again! LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Frother
customer_reviews.text: I needed a frother for work. The one at home is by Krups, the model goes for roughly $300. I wasn't going to buy one this expensive for work, so I was looking for an inexpensive desk sized machine. And let me tell you, this is it. Solidly built, delicious creamy foam. Cleans up fast, and froths the milk in minutes. I would buy again. I consider this a great buy. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: B. Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This milk frother, just like other Bosun products, is great. It frothes in no time and keeps warm if you happen to leave it on. I wash it by hand being careful not to submerge the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: Camille Hebting

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little thing. .
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little thing. But now that I've used it for awhile, a couple things... you have to be very careful not to put it back on the base without turning it off. I had a guest in my home that kept doing that and burnt the interior. I had to replace it. Now I wish I had purchased a larger capacity one. I do enjoy it and use it every day. I will definitely purchase a larger one when I am able...
customer_reviews.author: PdgC

customer_reviews.title: worked a few times
customer_reviews.text: It worked the first few times and now it only warms to tepid. So if you like barely warm drinks then that would be okay. Of course now the return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: The bomb!
customer_reviews.text: I stayed with family and they had this frother. I ordered it immediately. Love this thing!
customer_reviews.author: K. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.

customer_reviews.text: This product has shocked both my Husband and I. I believe I got a defective device because sometimes it works and other times it took a few try’s. After 3 weeks, mine has completely died. We are sheltering in place so, I’m not able to send it back via the post office. I would eventually like to send it back and get a better one. How can I get a credit so I can order a better one? Please advise.

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Ever!

customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.

customer_reviews.text: Mine worked fine until it did not. Bought in April, died in early July. It does the job, however one side on the bottom always burnt slightly. Had to put more effort into cleaning than it warranted. Like Bodum products; this was not one of them though.

customer_reviews.text: Decent milk frother for the price. Only has one setting. The switch doesn’t turn off when it stops frothing so have to remember to turn it off before replacing on base after washing.

customer_reviews.title: This little machine has changed my life.
